hanzi-su-wiki:
頒

Значения

Делить, распределять

Мнемоника

Распределение 分 имеющихся благ главой 頁 семьи.

Варианты

颁
purpleculture_pinyin:
bān
to promulgate; to send out; to issue; to grant or confer
обнародовать; разослать; выдавать; дарить или даровать
rtega_mnemonic:
頒頒RS
颁颁		confer, bestow, publish, promulgate
  • RS. a person 頁 who distributes 分: distribute
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 颁)
Ideographic: To pass out 分 a booklet 頁; 分 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
頒布 [ bān bù ]: to issue; to proclaim; to enact (laws, decrees etc)
頒發 [ bān fā ]: to issue; to promulgate; to award
頒獎 [ bān jiǎng ]: to confer an award
頒行 [ bān xíng ]: issue for enforcement
頒授 [ bān shòu ]: to confer (e.g. diploma); to award

heisig_chinese_memo: In part of my head (memory) I'll promulgate this hanzi. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: partition, part, eight, sword, dagger, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: The PART of my HEAD where I remember the KANJI is in the kanji PARTITION.
koohiiStory2: The last time I tried to partition a hard drive under Linux, I got a severe migraine that parted my head.

Ru_Radicals: ハ, 刀 (катана), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the page (頁) that divides (分) is a partition
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When giving a speech politicians just promulgate what they wrote on the page.  It's only a small part of what's going on in their heads.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " page ", " minute " sound. "Suo Wen" is based on the main meaning of the head, and quoted "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Yuzao" "has awarded its first." Mao Chuan is the "big first look". Seigo that " award " shall be read as " spot ", the first fish for fish culture. " Awarded " means " spots ", which means that the hair and beard are white. Such as "Mencius. "Liang Hui Wang": "The one who awards the white is worthy of wearing it on the road." Zhao Qi's note: "The first half is white, the one who is spotted is also the one."

" Awarding " through " class " means a reward. Such as "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Gong Bo": "Awarding his clothes and jewels in time, and holding him for rewards." Zheng Xuan's note: "Awarded, read as a class." Jia Gongyan said: "Fu and class both give the righteousness of giving." Another example is "Lv's Spring and Autumn. Making Music": "Awarding Tian Chou with his ranks in order to reward the officials."

" Award " means to announce or promulgate. Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Mingtang": "So Zhou Gong built Yan, and Ming princes were in the Mingtang, making rituals and making music, giving measurements and serving the world." "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi's "Tokyo Fu": "Naiying Sannomiya, sending out a regular mission."

" Awarded " also means points. Such as "Book of Rites. Sacrifice": "The ancient way, fifty do not serve the elders of the Qinlong." Zheng Xuan's note: "The words of the award are also divided." "The award of the bird" means to distribute the animals obtained from the field hunting to the officials.
humanum_short_description_en: From " page ", " minute " sound. " Awarded " mostly means reward and announcement.
humanum_full_description:
從「頁」，「分」聲。《說文》以為本義是大頭，並引《詩．小雅．魚藻》「有頒其首」。毛傳即訓為「大首貌」。于省吾以為「頒」應讀為「斑」，表示魚首有魚文。「頒」通「斑」，表示髮鬚斑白。如《孟子．梁惠王上》：「頒白者不負戴於道路矣。」趙岐注：「頭半白曰頒，斑斑然者也。」

　　「頒」通「班」，表示賞賜。如《周禮．天官．宮伯》：「以時頒其衣裘，掌其誅賞。」鄭玄注：「頒，讀為班。」賈公彥疏：「賦、班皆賜授之義。」又如《呂氏春秋．制樂》：「頒其爵列等級田疇，以賞群臣。」

　　「頒」表示公布、頒布。如《逸周書．明堂》：「故周公建焉，而明諸侯於明堂之位，制禮作樂，頒度量而天下大服。」《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「乃營三宮，布教頒常。」

　　「頒」也表示分。如《禮記．祭義》：「古之道，五十不為甸徒，頒禽隆諸長者。」鄭玄注：「頒之言分也。」「頒禽」意謂把田獵所得的禽獸分賜群臣。
humanum_short_description: 從「頁」，「分」聲。「頒」多表示賞賜、公布。

從「 頁 」，「 分 」聲。《說文》以為本義是大頭，並引《詩．小雅．魚藻》「有頒其首」。毛傳即訓為「大首貌」。于省吾以為「 頒 」應讀為「 斑 」，表示魚首有魚文。「 頒 」通「 斑 」，表示髮鬚斑白。如《孟子．梁惠王上》：「頒白者不負戴於道路矣。」趙岐注：「頭半白曰頒，斑斑然者也。」 「 頒 」通「 班 」，表示賞賜。如《周禮．天官．宮伯》：「以時頒其衣裘，掌其誅賞。」鄭玄注：「頒，讀為班。」賈公彥疏：「賦、班皆賜授之義。」又如《呂氏春秋．制樂》：「頒其爵列等級田疇，以賞群臣。」 「 頒 」表示公布、頒布。如《逸周書．明堂》：「故周公建焉，而明諸侯於明堂之位，制禮作樂，頒度量而天下大服。」《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「乃營三宮，布教頒常。」 「 頒 」也表示分。如《禮記．祭義》：「古之道，五十不為甸徒，頒禽隆諸長者。」鄭玄注：「頒之言分也。」「頒禽」意謂把田獵所得的禽獸分賜群臣。
From " page", " minute" sound. "Suo Wen" is based on the main meaning of the head, and quoted "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Yuzao" "has awarded its first." Mao Chuan is the "big first look". Seigo that " award" shall be read as " spot", the first fish for fish culture. " Awarded" means " spots", which means that the hair and beard are white. Such as "Mencius. "Liang Hui Wang": "The one who awards the white is worthy of wearing it on the road." Zhao Qi's note: "The first half is white, the one who is spotted is also the one." " Awarding" through " class" means a reward. Such as "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Gong Bo": "Awarding his clothes and jewels in time, and holding him for rewards." Zheng Xuan's note: "Awarded, read as a class." Jia Gongyan said: "Fu and class both give the righteousness of giving." Another example is "Lv's Spring and Autumn. Making Music": "Awarding Tian Chou with his ranks in order to reward the officials." " Award" means to announce or promulgate. Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Mingtang": "So Zhou Gong built Yan, and Ming princes were in the Mingtang, making rituals and making music, giving measurements and serving the world." "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi's "Tokyo Fu": "Naiying Sannomiya, sending out a regular mission." " Awarded" also means points. Such as "Book of Rites. Sacrifice": "The ancient way, fifty do not serve the elders of the Qinlong." Zheng Xuan's note: "The words of the award are also divided." "The award of the bird" means to distribute the animals obtained from the field hunting to the officials.

頒字的基本解释

頒
bān
见“颁”。

頒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fén］
［《廣韻》符分切，平文，奉。］
亦作“朌1”。“颁1”的繁体字。
大头貌。
[②]［bān］
［《廣韻》布還切，平删，幫。］
亦作“朌2”。“颁2”的繁体字。
(1)发布；公布。
(2)赏赐；分赏。
(3)分担；分任。
(4)次第。
(5)通“斑”。须发半白。参见“頒2白”。

頒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1401第08
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?符分切，音汾。【廣韻】魚大首。亦衆貌。【詩·小雅】魚在在藻，有頒其首。　又【唐韻】布還切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】逋還切，?音班。【廣韻】布也，賜也。【禮·明堂位】頒度量而天下大服。【註】頒，讀爲班。【周禮·天官·大宰】匪頒。【註】匪，分也。頒，讀爲班布之班，謂班賜也。　又【說文】鬢也。【正韻】頟兩旁曰頒。【孟子】頒白者。【註】頒，班也。頭半白班班者也。　又分也。【書·洛誥】乃惟孺子，頒朕不暇。【傳】我爲政，常若不暇。汝惟小子，當分取我之不暇而行之。【釋文】頒音班。又甫云反。　又【說文】通作朌。【禮·王制】名山大澤不以朌。【釋文】朌讀爲頒，賦也。　又鳥名。【揚子·方言】戴勝，自關而東或謂之戴頒。　又【揚子·方言】鋪頒，索也。東齊曰鋪頒，猶秦晉言抖藪也。　又古通先韻，?連切，音邊。【蘇軾·澄泥硯詩】長安新硯石同堅，不待書來遂許頒。

頒字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fén］
["Guangyun" Fu divided and cut, plain text, Feng. ]
Also known as "朌1". Traditional Chinese characters for "Bao 1".
The big picture.
[②]［bān］
["Guangyun" cloth still cut, flat cut, help. ]
Also known as "朌2". Traditional Chinese characters for "Publication 2".
(1) Release; announce.
(2) Rewards; rewards.
(3) Sharing; splitting of duties.
(4) The order.
(5) Through "spot". The beard is half white. See "Awards 2 White".
